0.label: has Bibliographic record identifier in Item reviewed

1.label: has Linking data in Item reviewed

3.label: has Authority record number in Item reviewed

5.label: has Institution to which field applies in Item reviewed

b.label: has General material designation in Item reviewed

c.label: has Place of publication in Item reviewed

d.label: has Date of publication in Item reviewed

e.label: has Edition statement in Item reviewed

f.label: has First statement of responsibility in Item reviewed

g.label: has Subsequent statement of responsibility in Item reviewed

h.label: has Number of section or part in Item reviewed

i.label: has Name of section or part in Item reviewed

l.label: has Parallel title in Item reviewed

m.label: has International Standard Music Number in Item reviewed

n.label: has Name of publisher, distributor, etc. in Item reviewed

o.label: has Other title information in Item reviewed

p.label: has Physical description in Item reviewed

s.label: has Series statement in Item reviewed

u.label: has Uniform Resource Identifier in Item reviewed

v.label: has Volume number in Item reviewed

y.label: has International Standard Book Number in Item reviewed
